```{=html}
<script>
  // Get all elements with class="image-description" (outside the popups) and attach the click event
  var descriptions = document.getElementsByClassName("image-description");
  for (let i = 0; i < descriptions.length; i++) {
    descriptions[i].onclick = function() {
      // Open the corresponding popup
      var popup = document.getElementById("popup" + (i + 1));
      popup.style.display = "block";
    }
  }

  // Get all elements with class="close" and attach the click event
  var closes = document.getElementsByClassName("close");
  for (let i = 0; i < closes.length; i++) {
    closes[i].onclick = function() {
      // Close the corresponding popup
      var popup = document.getElementById("popup" + (i + 1));
      popup.style.display = "none";
    }
  }
  // Get all elements with class="popup-background" and attach the click event
  var backgrounds = document.getElementsByClassName("popup-background");
  for (let i = 0; i < backgrounds.length; i++) {
    backgrounds[i].onclick = function() {
      // Close the corresponding popup
      var popup = document.getElementById("popup" + (i + 1));
      popup.style.display = "none";
    }
  }
  // Move all popups to the body element
  var popups = Array.from(document.getElementsByClassName("popup"));
  for (var i = 0; i < popups.length; i++) {
    document.body.appendChild(popups[i]);
  }

  // When the user clicks anywhere outside of a popup, close it
  window.onclick = function(event) {
    if (event.target.className == "popup") {
      event.target.style.display = "none";
    }
  }
</script>
```
